document_data.name: Disciples of the Salamander
document_data.alignment: {{Alignment grid | off  | off  | off | off | off | off | on  | on | on }}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Disciples of the Salamander''' was an order of [[monk]]s who worshiped [[Kossuth]], the Tyrant Among Fire.
document_data.Activities: Members of the Disciples of the Salamander were wicked individuals. The order maintained their own abbey and participated in strict martial training.
